tool_purpose: Calculates the concrete volume required for a rectangular concrete wall.

inputs.label: Wall Length
inputs.explanation: The total length of the wall.

inputs.label: Wall Height
inputs.explanation: The vertical height of the wall.

inputs.label: Wall Thickness
inputs.explanation: The thickness of the concrete wall.

outputs.label: Concrete Volume
outputs.description: Total concrete volume required for the wall.

outputs.label: Concrete Volume
outputs.description: Total concrete volume required for the wall in cubic yards.

assumptions: No waste or overage is included.

tool_notes.title: How this calculator works
tool_notes.text: This calculator multiplies wall length, height, and thickness to determine total concrete volume.

tool_notes.title: When to use this calculator
tool_notes.text: Use this calculator when estimating concrete for foundation walls, retaining walls, or similar structures.

seo.meta_description: Calculate the concrete volume needed for a rectangular concrete wall based on length, height, and thickness.
